description:
An additional costume for Sophie: "Easy Breezy".

Note: Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" at the desk in the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information. 
This item is available to the players who have preordered "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream", "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition", or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition" before February 24th, 2022.
name: Sophie's Costume "Easy Breezy"
